desc.cn: Globalping CLI 是网络优化必备的一体化工具
desc.en: Globalping CLI is a must have all-in-one tool for network optimization

debian/apt.cmd:
curl -s https://packagecloud.io/install/repositories/jsdelivr/globalping/script.deb.sh | sudo bash && \
sudo apt install globalping

ubuntu/apt.cmd:
curl -s https://packagecloud.io/install/repositories/jsdelivr/globalping/script.deb.sh | sudo bash && \
sudo apt install globalping

centos/dnf.cmd:
curl -s https://packagecloud.io/install/repositories/jsdelivr/globalping/script.rpm.sh | sudo bash && \
sudo dnf install globalping

fedora/dnf.cmd:
curl -s https://packagecloud.io/install/repositories/jsdelivr/globalping/script.rpm.sh | sudo bash && \
sudo dnf install globalping

rocky/dnf.cmd:
curl -s https://packagecloud.io/install/repositories/jsdelivr/globalping/script.rpm.sh | sudo bash && \
sudo dnf install globalping

alma/dnf.cmd:
curl -s https://packagecloud.io/install/repositories/jsdelivr/globalping/script.rpm.sh | sudo bash && \
sudo dnf install globalping

darwin/brew.cmd:
brew tap jsdelivr/globalping && \
brew install globalping
